name: ImagePaint
desc: A shape style that fills a shape by repeating a region of an image.

items.name: init(image: Image, sourceRect: CGRect, scale: CGFloat)
var scale: CGFloat
items.desc: A scale factor applied to the image while being drawn.

items.name: var sourceRect: CGRect
items.desc: A unit-space rectangle defining how much of the source image to draw.
